metadata.title: CVE-2024-47731 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers/perf: Fix ali_drw_pmu driver interrupt status clearingThe alibaba_uncore_pmu driver forgot to clear all interrupt statusin the interrupt processing function. After the PMU counter overflowinterrupt occurred, an interrupt storm occurred, causing the systemto hang.Therefore, clear the correct interrupt status in the interrupt handlingfunction to fix it.
